name: Energizing Gel Cream
description: Glow for it with our best moisturizer for oily skin: it hydrates for 72 hours, improves skin’s moisture barrier and the best part—delivers all-day glow.
how_to_use: AM and PM, dot, pat, press the moisturizer onto clean skin or after you apply treatment lotion and serum.
ingredients.Vital-Synthesis Technology: Helps provide skin with natural energy to revitalize the look of tired skin
ingredients.Vitamin C: Antioxidant-rich ingredient helps brighten skin over time
